name: Millennium Ring
text: Activate only when your opponent would destroy 1 or more face-down card(s) you control. Negate that effect and destroy this card instead. If this face-down card is destroyed, draw 1 card for every 2 monsters your opponent controls. You can banish this card in your GY, target 1 monster you control; that card cannot be destroyed by battle this turn (this is a quick effect). Only 1 "Millenium Ring" effect can be activated per turn.
